mapper.sql: ID, GROUP_ID, USER_ID, IS_ADMIN, TENANT_ID, CREATE_DATE, CHANGE_DATE, CREATOR_ID, (select g.group_name from sys_group g where g.group_id = x.group_id) GROUP_NAME, DEL_FLAG
mapper.select:
select distinct 'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_GROUP_USER x
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_SYS_GROUP_USER.nextval as id from sys.dual
insert into SYS_GROUP_USER
ID,
GROUP_ID,
USER_ID,
IS_ADMIN,
TENANT_ID,
CREATE_DATE,
CHANGE_DATE,
CREATOR_ID,
DEL_FLAG,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{tenantId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sysdate,
#{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update SYS_GROUP_USER
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHANGE_DATE = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_GROUP_USER set GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHANGE_DATE = #{changeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select distinct r.GROUP_ID as groupId, t.tenant_name||'â€”'||r.GROUP_NAME as groupName, r.DESCRIPTION as description, r.PARENT_GROUP_ID as parentGroupId, r.TENANT_ID as tenantId, r.CREATE_DATE as createDate, r.CHANGE_DATE as changeDate, r.CREATOR_ID as creatorId, r.DEL_FLAG as delFlag, gr.group_role_name as groupRoleName from SYS_GROUP r inner join SYS_GROUP_USER l on l.GROUP_ID = r.GROUP_ID and l.DEL_FLAG = 0 inner join SYS_USER_GROUP_ROLE ugr on l.USER_ID = ugr.USER_ID and ugr.DEL_FLAG = 0 inner join SYS_GROUP_ROLE gr on r.GROUP_ID = gr.GROUP_ID and ugr.GROUP_ROLE_ID = gr.GROUP_ROLE_ID and gr.DEL_FLAG = 0 inner join Sys_Tenant t on r.TENANT_ID = t.ID and t.DEL_FLAG = 0 where l.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and r.DEL_FLAG = 0

select t.id group_user_id,t.user_id,u.username user_name,u.dept user_dept,t.create_date,u.phone user_phone,t.is_admin from sys_group_user t inner join sys_user u on t.user_id = u.user_id where t.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and u.del_flag = 0 and t.del_flag = 0 and u.status = 'enabled'
select t.group_id,g.group_name,t.create_date from sys_group_user t inner join sys_group g on t.group_id = g.group_id where t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and g.del_flag = 0 and t.del_flag = 0

select distinct u.user_id,u.username user_name,u.dept user_dept,u.phone user_phone from sys_user u inner join sys_tenant_member t on u.user_id = t.user_id where 1 = 1 and u.status = 'enabled' and t.tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and u.del_flag = 0 and t.del_flag = 0 and u.user_id not in (11,12,13) and u.user_id not in( select x.user_id from sys_group_user x where x.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and x.del_flag = 0 )
and u.username like '%'||#{userNameLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
